name: research-topics
description: Research topics for evaluation of multi-agent research system

data.input: Research quantum computing fundamentals and applications
data.expected: Research should cover quantum principles, quantum gates, current applications, and future potential

data.input: Analyze blockchain technology in supply chain management
data.expected: Should discuss distributed ledgers, smart contracts, transparency, traceability, and current use cases

data.input: Explore machine learning ethics and bias mitigation
data.expected: Should cover algorithmic bias, fairness definitions, detection methods, and mitigation strategies
Should include infrastructure resilience, ecosystem adaptation, policy responses, and community preparedness

data.input: Research artificial intelligence in healthcare diagnostics
data.expected: Should discuss AI diagnostic tools, accuracy improvements, regulatory challenges, and patient privacy

data.input: Analyze current cybersecurity threats and defense mechanisms
data.expected: Should cover zero-trust architecture, AI-based detection, incident response, and threat intelligence

data.input: Research renewable energy technologies and grid integration
data.expected: Should discuss solar, wind, battery storage, smart grids, and economic viability

data.input: Investigate CRISPR gene editing technology and applications
data.expected: Should cover CRISPR mechanics, therapeutic applications, ethical considerations, and regulatory framework
